title: Fix unreadable note messages at the bottom of the site

requirements.text: Fix the text visibility and contrast issue for heart note messages/NoteCard popups displayed at the bottom of the site. Ensure the note text, creator name, and date are clearly readable against their background in all positions on the canvas, applying sufficient contrast ratios and appropriate text color overrides so the romantic styling does not obscure legibility.

quotes: theres a littel error the msgs coming at the bottom are not readable pls fix that

acceptanceCriteria: NoteCard popup text (message, creator, date) is clearly readable regardless of its vertical position on the page
Text contrast meets a minimum ratio of 4.5:1 against the card background
NoteCard background has sufficient opacity or solid fill so underlying decorative elements do not bleed through and reduce readability
The fix applies consistently for all heart notes whether they appear near the top, middle, or bottom of the canvas

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/ (immutable paths)
Do not alter the romantic visual theme â€” only improve contrast/readability
nonGoals: Redesigning the NoteCard layout or adding new fields
Modifying the hero section or personal greeting component
